0.title: [stationName] Spring Average Precipitation
0.subTitle: March to May
0.caption: Average annual spring (March to May) precipitation. The lowest (min) and highest (max) precipitation of the month.

1.title: [stationName] Spring Average Precipitation Difference from Baseline
1.caption: Difference between the spring (March-May) seasonal averages and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.
